title: How many books are provided for the IPCC level? - Quora

response.answer_text: For existing syllabus there are 34 books in total for both groups provided by ICAI to the student who registered for IPCC. Group 1: Accounting: - 2 Study Materials and 1 Practice Manual.Business Law, Ethics & Communication: - 1 Study material of each and 1 Integrated Practice Manual for all.Cost Accounting and Financial Management: - 2 Study materials each for Costing and FM and 1 Seperate Practice Manual for each.Taxation: - 3 Study Materials for Direct Taxation and 1 Study Material for Indirect Taxation & 1 Practice Manual for each.Total Number of books: 19 Group 2: Advanced Accounting: - 3 Study Materials and 1 Practice Manual.Auditing & Assurance: - 2 Study Materials and 1 Practice manual. Also one additional material for reference called “Auditing Pronouncements”Information Technology and Strategic Management: - 1 Study Material for each and 1 Practice Manual for each.Total number of books: 12. Total number of books in both groups: - 19+12= 31 Excluding these books there are 3 additional books provided by ICAI namely Guidance Notes for preparation of IPCCDo's and Dont's while preparing for IPCCSupplementary book for taxation paper which are amendments in Finance Act of the year after printing and publishing of the book.So, the total number of books you'll get after a successful registration with ICAI are 31+3=34. Too much study. But trust me it is worthy to study each and every book cause you'll get only best out of it. Study hard and get what you want. All the best!!
